volatility_alpha.rationale: Chain-of-Thought: IV (25%) > HV (22%) → Volatility overpriced by 3%

directional_alpha.rationale: Chain-of-Thought: Momentum (0.15) + Sentiment (0.65) + RSI (65) → Bullish bias

arbitrage_alpha.rationale: Chain-of-Thought: Vol surface fairly priced, minimal calendar spread opportunities

hedging_alpha.rationale: Chain-of-Thought: Moderate market risks + sentiment volatility → Protective hedging beneficial
